name: Elixir (MakSM)
description:
Kyle's city has been attacked, and they've used his own special potions to do it. Use various different potions to enhance your abilites to help Kyle and  his friend take back what's theirs.

Move: WASD 

Throw potion: Left mouse

Change potion: Scroll wheel

This is essentially my first ever proper game, so please report any criticisms, bugs or balance issues as they're really helpful.  (I know the story's a little sub par and the graphics are a little rough but I'm not really an artist :P)

Outro song: Aethernaut - Unpause the heat
